title: Oatmeal with banana and cinnamon
instructions: 1. In a medium saucepan, combine the rolled oats, milk, water, and salt. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally. 2. Once boiling, reduce heat to low and simmer for 5-7 minutes, stirring frequently, until the oats are creamy and have absorbed most of the liquid. 3. While the oats cook, slice 2 bananas into rounds about 1/4-inch thick. Dice the remaining banana into small pieces. 4. In a separate skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the sliced bananas and cook for 2-3 minutes per side until golden and slightly caramelized. 5. Sprinkle 1 teaspoon of cinnamon over the cooking bananas and gently toss. 6. Once the oatmeal is done, remove from heat and stir in the vanilla extract, diced banana, and remaining 1 teaspoon of cinnamon. Add honey or maple syrup if desired for extra sweetness. 7. Divide the oatmeal among 4 bowls. Top each serving with the caramelized banana slices. 8. Sprinkle with additional cinnamon and a pinch of nutmeg if desired. Serve immediately while hot.
description: Creamy, warming oatmeal topped with sweet caramelized bananas and aromatic cinnamon. A wholesome breakfast that's naturally sweetened and packed with fiber to keep you satisfied all morning.
